metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40152 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: Those using Woodstox to parse XML data may be vulnerable to Denial of Service attacks (DOS) if DTD support is enabled. If the parser is running on user supplied input, an attacker may supply content that causes the parser to crash by stackoverflow. This effect may support a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: libxstream-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
